name: EventDropSlot
description: This event is triggered when an item is dropped from an inventory slot.
overview: Fires when a player drops items from an inventory slot. The `all` field indicates if the player dropped the entire stack or just one item. This event is cancellable - preventing the drop action. Works with both inventory screens and hotbar drops.

methods.name: getInventory
methods.description: Returns the inventory object associated with this drop event. This provides access to the full inventory, allowing you to examine the item being dropped, check other slots, or perform additional inventory operations.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of the event object.
